'''The Breaking of the Fellowship''' is the thirty-eighth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and the forty-fourth of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition.
